summary: Monorepo for a recipe / OCR / sous-chef app with a React SPA client, TypeScript Express server, and a small recipe-cleaning microservice.

services.name: client
services.purpose: SPA (web app) - main user interface, contains PKCE/OAuth flows, recipes UI, Grocery list UI and OCR frontend
services.styles: CSS modules and top-level styles (client/src/components/** and src/index.css)
notes: Uses PKCE + Google OAuth helper flows
Contains OCR client code using tesseract.js
Deploys to Firebase Hosting in CI in production flows (mentions firebase-tools)

services.name: server
services.purpose: Production backend API, auth, DB migrations, DI and business logic
notes: Has OCR worker built as separate process and can run migrations

services.name: clean-recipe-service
services.purpose: Small microservice for recipe normalization / canonicalization (used by server + OCR worker)
notes: Provides canonicalization and synonym maps (see src/synonyms.ts)

dev_infrastructure.ci: CI references in repo (server tests expect clean-recipe-service to run in CI). There are GitHub Actions for server and E2E flows in project documentation.
deployment: Cloud Run / Docker for server in some deployment docs
dev_infrastructure.secrets: Uses Google Secret Manager in server and has helper scripts for secret uploads
observability_and_misc: Uses console logging, some health endpoints, and custom eventing patterns (eg. groceryListUpdated)
